div.h4: Our small town communities have a warm welcome for you!

div.p: Jefferson Davis Parish (French: Paroisse de Jefferson Davis) is named after the President of the Confederacy during the American Civil War, Jefferson Davis, and founded in 1912. The first oil in Louisiana was drilled in 1901 in what is now Jeff Davis Parish. We are located in southwestern Louisiana.

Jeff Davis Parish comprises five incorporate towns including Elton, Fenton, Jennings (Parish seat), Lake Arthur, and Welsh. Centered between Houston, TX and New Orleans, LA. Jeff Davis Parish is a quaint, rural community that is strategically positioned for success. Interstate 10 runs east and west through the center of our parish, providing quick and easy access to local markets. Our area offers many ways for economic growth and lots of interest for tourism. From unique cuisine to a variety of landscapes, our area is rich in culture.

div.div: ABOUT THE CHAMBER OUR MISSION The Jeff Davis Chamber of Commerce leads and strengthens Jeff Davis Parish’s business community through promotion, education and advocacy on behalf of it’s members. PROGRAMS & INITIATIVES Business-After-Hours is a social event hosted by a chamber member business. The event is designed to spotlight the host business, an opportunity to invite potential members to the event, and provide networking space for attendees. RIBBON CUTTING/GRAND OPENING New chamber members can set the date and time for a ribbon cutting or grand opening and the chamber staff will assist with the design and promotion of the event. BULK MAIL PRIVILEDGES The chambers bulk mail permit can save your business dollars when mailing flyers, post cards or letters. ANNUAL BUSINESS AWARDS Employee of the Year Business Person of the Year Citizen of the Year Young Citizen of the Year MARKETING OPPORTUNITIES Sponsorship Opportunities Referrals Leadership Opportunities Inclusion in the online & printed chamber membership directory

div.div:
🦠 Coronavirus is having an affect on us all, especially a lot of small businesses like mine. Here's a super simple way you can help:
PLEASE GO TO MY BUSINESS PAGE
🇺🇸🇺🇸⛽️⛽️ Hobo’s Deli ⛽️⛽️🇺🇸🇺🇸
Scroll across the top to the right, go to “COMMUNITY”
Click “INVITE FRIENDS”
Click “ALL”
Wait 10-15 seconds for the invitations to send
- it’s as simple as that -
If you have a local business please feel free to COMMENT DONE & I’ll Do The Same For Your business.
Supporting small businesses doesn’t require spending money. It’s as simple as sharing, liking and promoting us! So thank you for every little thing, thank you!!!
(Copy and Pasted and edited from another small business)
THANK YOU and stay safe 😎

div.p: Welcome to the Jeff Davis Parish website, your online portal for culture, travel info and local events.
Our team is busy working to bring you the best of everything we have to offer. Come visit for great food and lots of fun!

input.name: ctct-opt-in
input.label: Yes, I would like to receive emails from Jeff Davis Parish. (You can unsubscribe anytime)

hr.sub: By submitting this form, you are consenting to receive marketing emails from: Jeff Davis Parish Tourist Commission, 100 Rue de l'Acadie , Jennings, LA, 70546. You can revoke your consent to receive emails at any time by using the SafeUnsubscribe® link, found at the bottom of every email. Emails are serviced by Constant Contact
